content: world that moves too fast i invite you to slow down and create clothing with your own hands instead of simply consuming a knitted piece is more than just clothing it elevates your presence adds lightness and lets you feel effortlessly put together my knitting journey began with my eldest child and because i love dressing my children in delicate hand-knitted designs allureknits also offers patterns for the little ones each of my designs carries the signature of mindfulness femininity and simplicity made to accompany you for a long time and to become part of your own story happy knitting please make sure to tag me @allureknits and use the hashtags #allureknits and #rosemaryscarf when you share your creation on instagram this pattern is for private use only and may not be copied sold or otherwise distributed 6
